name: W. P. Carey Inc.
description: W. P. Carey Inc. is a leading global net lease real estate investment trust (REIT) that specializes in the acquisition and management of commercial properties. Founded in 1973, the company has built a diversified portfolio of over 1,200 properties across various sectors, including industrial, warehouse, retail, and office spaces, primarily located in the United States and Europe. W. P. Carey focuses on long-term, net lease agreements, which provide stable and predictable cash flows. With a strong commitment to delivering value to its shareholders, the company maintains a disciplined investment strategy, targeting properties with strong underlying fundamentals and creditworthy tenants. W. P. Carey is also known for its commitment to sustainability, incorporating environmentally responsible practices in its operations and property management. The company is publicly traded on the New York Stock Exchange and is a member of the S&P 500 index, highlighting its prominence in the real estate sector. With a robust track record of dividend payments and a focus on long-term growth, W. P. Carey continues to be a trusted name in the world of real estate investment.

seo.meta_title: W. P. Carey Inc. | Leading Net Lease REIT
seo.meta_description: Explore W. P. Carey Inc., a premier net lease REIT specializing in commercial property investments. Learn about our portfolio, investment strategy, and commitment to sustainability.

faq.question: What does W. P. Carey do?
faq.answer: W. P. Carey is a net lease REIT that acquires and manages commercial properties across various sectors.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of W. P. Carey?
faq.answer: Jason E. Fox is the CEO of W. P. Carey Inc.

faq.question: Where is W. P. Carey headquartered?
faq.answer: W. P. Carey is headquartered in New York, New York, USA.

faq.question: What types of properties does W. P. Carey invest in?
faq.answer: W. P. Carey invests in industrial, retail, and office properties under long-term net lease agreements.

faq.question: When was W. P. Carey founded?
faq.answer: W. P. Carey was founded in 1973.
